00020 {
00021 
00022    /* 
00023    * Default Constructor.
00024    */
00025    ParamComposite::ParamComposite() 
00026     : ParamComponent(),
00027       list_(),
00028       isLeaf_(),
00029       size_(0)
00030    {}
00031 
00032    /*
00033    * Constructor.
00034    */
00035    ParamComposite::ParamComposite(int capacity)
00036     : ParamComponent(),
00037       list_(),
00038       isLeaf_(),
00039       size_(0)
00040    {
00041       if (capacity <= 0 ) {
00042          UTIL_THROW("Attempt to reserve capacity <= 0");
00043       }
00044       list_.reserve(capacity);
00045       isLeaf_.reserve(capacity);
00046    }
00047    
00048    /* 
00049    * Copy constructor.
00050    */
00051    ParamComposite::ParamComposite(const ParamComposite& other) 
00052     : ParamComponent(other),
00053       list_(),
00054       isLeaf_(),
00055       size_(0)
00056    {}
00057 
00058    /* 
00059    * Destructor.
00060    */
00061    ParamComposite::~ParamComposite()
00062    {
00063     
00064       if (size_ > 0) { 
00065          for (int i=0; i < size_; ++i) {
00066             if (isLeaf_[i]) {
00067                delete list_[i];
00068             }
00069          }
00070       }
00071    }
00072   
00073    /* 
00074    * Default writeParam implementation.
00075    */
00076    void ParamComposite::writeParam(std::ostream &out) 
00077    {
00078       for (int i=0; i < size_; ++i) {
00079          list_[i]->writeParam(out);
00080       }
00081    }
00082    
00083    /* 
00084    * Reset list to empty state.
00085    */
00086    void ParamComposite::resetParam() 
00087    {
00088       for (int i=0; i < size_; ++i) {
00089          if (isLeaf_[i]) {
00090             delete list_[i];
00091          } else {
00092             list_[i]->resetParam();
00093          }
00094       }
00095       size_ = 0;
00096    }
00097    
00098    // ParamComposite object
00099    
00100    /* 
00101    * Add a ParamComposite node to the tree.
00102    */
00103    void ParamComposite::addParamComposite(ParamComposite &child, bool next) 
00104    {
00105       child.setIndent(*this, next);
00106       list_.push_back(&child);
00107       isLeaf_.push_back(false);
00108       ++size_;
00109       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00110       if (hasParamCommunicator()) 
00111          child.setParamCommunicator(paramCommunicator());
00112       #endif
00113    }
00114    
00115    /* 
00116    * Add a ParamComposite Node, and read the contents of that ParamComposite.
00117    */
00118    void 
00119    ParamComposite::readParamComposite(std::istream &in, ParamComposite &child, bool next) 
00120    {
00121       addParamComposite(child, next);
00122       list_.back()->readParam(in);
00123    }
00124  
00125    // Begin
00126    
00127    /* 
00128    * Add a new Begin object.
00129    */
00130    Begin& ParamComposite::addBegin(const char *label) 
00131    {
00132       Begin* ptr = new Begin(label);
00133       list_.push_back(ptr);
00134       isLeaf_.push_back(true);
00135       ptr->setIndent(*this, false);
00136       ++size_;
00137       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00138          if (hasParamCommunicator()) 
00139             ptr->setParamCommunicator(paramCommunicator());
00140       #endif
00141       return *ptr;
00142    }
00143    
00144    /* 
00145    * Read the opening line of a ParamComposite.
00146    */
00147    Begin& ParamComposite::readBegin(std::istream &in, const char *label) 
00148    {
00149       Begin* ptr = &addBegin(label);
00150       ptr->readParam(in);
00151       return *ptr;
00152    }
00153    
00154    // End
00155    
00156    /* 
00157    * Add a new End object.
00158    */
00159    End& ParamComposite::addEnd() 
00160    {
00161       End* ptr = new End();
00162       list_.push_back(ptr);
00163       isLeaf_.push_back(true);
00164       ptr->setIndent(*this, false);
00165       ++size_;
00166       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00167          if (hasParamCommunicator()) 
00168             ptr->setParamCommunicator(paramCommunicator());
00169       #endif
00170       return *ptr;
00171    }
00172    
00173    /* 
00174    * Read the closing bracket of a ParamComposite.
00175    */
00176    End& ParamComposite::readEnd(std::istream &in) 
00177    {
00178       End* ptr = &addEnd();
00179       ptr->readParam(in);
00180       return *ptr;
00181    }

00184    
00185    /* 
00186    * Add a Blank object (a blank line).
00187    */
00188    Blank& ParamComposite::addBlank() 
00189    {
00190       Blank* ptr = new Blank();
00191       list_.push_back(ptr);
00192       isLeaf_.push_back(true);
00193       ++size_;
00194       #ifdef UTIL_MPI
00195       if (hasParamCommunicator()) 
00196          ptr->setParamCommunicator(paramCommunicator());
00197       #endif
00198       return *ptr;
00199    }
00200    
00201    /* 
00202    * Read a blank line.
00203    */
00204    Blank& ParamComposite::readBlank(std::istream &in) 
00205    {
00206       Blank* ptr = &addBlank();
00207       ptr->readParam(in);
00208       return *ptr;
00209    }
